Wireless Set Top Box

Your set top box has gone Wi-Fi, so you can watch anywhere!

Take this new technology outside

It’s a beautiful day, and you want to sit outside to catch your favorite shows on a big TV. Done. That’s what a wireless STB means for your life on FiOS®.

You have the power of FiOS® all over your house

Sometimes you just want to move a TV to another room—for guests, a party, whatever. Whenever you want, network with your Whole Home DVR, and watch live TV or your recordings. Ask us about watching wireless!
